00020 cDSettings::cDSettings(cMainWindow *parent)
00021     : QDialog(parent)
00022 {
00023     parentCWidget = parent;
00024     setupUi(this); // create widget from ui file
00025 
00026     setSettingsDialog();
00027 
00028     /* checkBoxes autoexlusivity and disable */
00029     connect(this->checkBox_multisampling, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)),\
00030             this, SLOT(unCheckAA(bool)));
00031     connect(this->checkBox_antialiasing, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)),\
00032             this, SLOT(unCheckMS(bool)));
00033     /* buttonBox_settings */
00034     connect(this->buttonBox_settings, SIGNAL(accepted()),\
00035             this, SLOT(acceptSettings()));
00036     connect(this->buttonBox_settings, SIGNAL(rejected()),\
00037             this, SLOT(rejectSettings()));
00038 }

00052 void cDSettings::unCheckAA(bool state)
00053 {
00054     if(state)
00055     {
00056         this->checkBox_antialiasing->setChecked(false);
00057         //this->horizontalSlider_antialiasing_all->setValue(this->horizontalSlider_antiAliasing_all->value());
00058     }
00059 }

00068 void cDSettings::unCheckMS(bool state)
00069 {
00070     if(state)
00071     {
00072         this->checkBox_multisampling->setChecked(false);
00073         //this->horizontalSlider_antialiasing_all->setValue(this->horizontalSlider_antiAliasing_all->value());
00074     }
00075 }

00085 void cDSettings::acceptSettings()
00086 {
00087 
00088     evalSettings();
00089     this->parentCWidget->writeSettings();
00090     this->close();
00091 }
00092 
00100 void cDSettings::rejectSettings()
00101 {
00102     parentCWidget->settings_recreateGL = false;
00103     this->close();
00104 }
00105 
00111 void cDSettings::evalSettings()
00112 {
00113 
00114     // Anti-aliasing checkbox
00115     if(checkBox_antialiasing->isChecked())
00116     {
00117         parentCWidget->settings_antialiasing = hSlider_antialiasing->value();
00118     } else
00119     {
00120         parentCWidget->settings_antialiasing = 0;
00121     }
00122 
00123     if(checkBox_multisampling->isChecked())
00124     {
00125         if(parentCWidget->settings_multisampling != \
00126            hSlider_multisampling->value())
00127         {
00128             parentCWidget->settings_recreateGL = true;
00129             parentCWidget->settings_multisampling = \
00130                 hSlider_multisampling->value();
00131         } else parentCWidget->settings_recreateGL = false;
00132     } else
00133     {
00134         if(parentCWidget->settings_multisampling != 0)
00135         {
00136             parentCWidget->settings_recreateGL = true;
00137             parentCWidget->settings_multisampling = 0;
00138         } else parentCWidget->settings_recreateGL = false;
00139     }
00140 
00141     if(checkBox_navigation->isChecked())
00142     {
00143         parentCWidget->settings_navigation = true;
00144     } else
00145     {
00146         parentCWidget->settings_navigation = false;
00147     }
00148 
00149     if(checkBox_navigation->isChecked())
00150     {
00151         parentCWidget->settings_navigation = true;
00152     } else
00153     {
00154         parentCWidget->settings_navigation = false;
00155     }
00156 
00157     if(radioButton_smallship->isChecked())
00158     {
00159         if(parentCWidget->settings_object != QString("small_ship.obj"))
00160             parentCWidget->settings_recreateGL = true;
00161         parentCWidget->settings_object = QString("small_ship.obj");
00162     } else if(radioButton_alienship->isChecked())
00163     {
00164         if(parentCWidget->settings_object != QString("alien_ship.obj"))
00165             parentCWidget->settings_recreateGL = true;
00166         parentCWidget->settings_object = QString("alien_ship.obj");
00167     } else if(radioButton_ownship->isChecked())
00168     {
00169         if(parentCWidget->settings_object != QString("own_ship.obj"))
00170             parentCWidget->settings_recreateGL = true;
00171         parentCWidget->settings_object = QString("own_ship.obj");
00172     } else
00173     {
00174         if(parentCWidget->settings_object != QString("small_ship.obj"))
00175             parentCWidget->settings_recreateGL = true;
00176         parentCWidget->settings_object = QString("small_ship.obj");
00177     }
00178 
00179     if(radioButton_triangles->isChecked())
00180     {
00181         parentCWidget->settings_polygons = 0;
00182     } else if(radioButton_quads->isChecked())
00183     {
00184         parentCWidget->settings_polygons = 1;
00185     } else
00186     {
00187         parentCWidget->settings_polygons = 0;
00188     }
00189 }

00196 void cDSettings::setSettingsDialog()
00197 {
00198     //parentCWidget->readSettings();
00199 
00200     if(parentCWidget->settings_multisampling)
00201     {
00202         checkBox_multisampling->setChecked(true);
00203         hSlider_multisampling->setValue(parentCWidget->settings_multisampling);
00204     } else
00205     {
00206         checkBox_antialiasing->setChecked(false);
00207         hSlider_antialiasing->setValue(0);
00208     }
00209 
00210     if(parentCWidget->settings_antialiasing)
00211     {
00212         checkBox_antialiasing->setChecked(true);
00213         hSlider_antialiasing->setValue(parentCWidget->settings_antialiasing);
00214     } else
00215     {
00216         checkBox_antialiasing->setChecked(false);
00217         hSlider_antialiasing->setValue(0);
00218     }
00219 
00220     if(parentCWidget->settings_navigation)
00221     {
00222         checkBox_navigation->setChecked(true);
00223     } else
00224     {
00225         checkBox_navigation->setChecked(false);
00226     }
00227 
00228     if(parentCWidget->settings_object == QString("small_ship.obj"))
00229     {
00230 //        radioButton_own_ship->setChecked(false);
00231 //        radioButton_alienship->setChecked(false);
00232         radioButton_smallship->setChecked(true);
00233     } else if(parentCWidget->settings_object == QString("alien_ship.obj"))
00234     {
00235 //        radioButton_smallship->setChecked(false);
00236 //        radioButton_own_ship->setChecked(false);
00237         radioButton_alienship->setChecked(true);
00238     } else if(parentCWidget->settings_object == QString("own_ship.obj"))
00239     {
00240 //        radioButton_smallship->setChecked(false);
00241 //        radioButton_alienship->setChecked(false);
00242         radioButton_ownship->setChecked(true);
00243     } else
00244     {
00245 //        radioButton_alienship->setChecked(false);
00246 //        radioButton_own_ship->setChecked(false);
00247         radioButton_smallship->setChecked(true);
00248     }
00249 
00250     if(parentCWidget->settings_polygons == 0)
00251     {
00252         radioButton_triangles->setChecked(true);
00253         //radioButton_quads->setChecked(false);
00254     } else
00255     {
00256         //radioButton_triangles->setChecked(false);
00257         radioButton_quads->setChecked(true);
00258     }
00259 }
